document.full_text: having evaded apparent hollywood star whackers to get to canada, randy quaid is to perform his new song, fittingly called "star whackers," in vancouver on friday night.
document.title: randy quaid to debut "star whackers" song on stage
lines_and_colors: having evaded apparent hollywood star whackers to get to canada, randy quaid is to perform his new song, fittingly called "star whackers," in vancouver on friday night.
